recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (rinsed and drained): 1 can (15 ounces) - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - red onion (finely chopped): 1 small - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - Kalamata olives (pitted and sliced): 1/4 cup - lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - fresh parsley (chopped): 1/4 cup - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon - lettuce leaves (to serve, such as Bibb or Romaine): 12 large leaves
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Salad: In a large mixing bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, red onion, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and Kalamata olives. 2. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, parsley, oregano, salt, and black pepper. 3. Combine: Pour the dressing over the chickpea mixture and toss to coat evenly. 4. Serve: Spoon the chickpea salad into lettuce leaves, folding them into cups. 5. Chill: Refrigerate the salad cups until ready to serve, ideally keeping them cool until serving.
